UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Multipurpose peptides: The venoms of Amazonian stinging ants contain anthelmintic ponericins with diverse predatory and defensive activities.
Literature.Author: Nixon SA, Robinson SD, Agwa AJ, Walker AA, Choudhary S, Touchard A, Undheim EAB, Robertson A, Vetter I, Schroeder CI, Kotze AC, Herzig V, King GF

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>100 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=5.2-6.8 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2.3-4.7µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=5.9-11.8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1.48µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=11.8-23.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=23.7-47.4µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=1.48-2.9µM),Haemonchus contortus(IC50=5.6±1.3µM),Lucilia cuprina(LD50=3.5±0.8nmol/g)
